import React, { useState } from 'react' import 'bootstrap/dist/css/bootstrap.min.css'; import { Link, useNavigate } from 'react-router-dom'; import "./loginform.css" import { toast } from 'react-toastify'; import 'react-toastify/dist/ReactToastify.css'; import axios from 'axios'; function Login() { const [Data, setData] = useState({}) const navigate = useNavigate() const handlechange = (e) => { setData({ ...Data, [e.target.name]: e.target.value }); } const handlesubmit = (e) => { e.preventDefault(); axios.post("https://hotelbookingapp-api.herokuapp.com/api/auth/login", Data).then((res) => { console.log(res.status, "=-=-=-=-=-=-=-"); if (res.status === 200) { toast.success("Login Successfully") } }) } return ( <>
